entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 6:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: WSW 38 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:44 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
